title: AWS Data Storage to Azure Data Services: Data Warehousing and Lake Management
certificationWeight: 26% - Data Store Management Domain (Second Largest Weight)
description: Master data storage and warehousing by implementing AWS data lake and warehouse solutions, then migrating to Azure data services with modern data architecture, performance optimization, and scalable storage management.
learningObjectives: Design data lake architectures using Amazon S3 and Azure Data Lake Storage
Implement data warehousing with Amazon Redshift and Azure Synapse Analytics
Build data partitioning and indexing strategies for performance optimization
Create data lifecycle management and cost optimization policies
Implement data compression, encoding, and storage optimization techniques
Design hybrid data architectures supporting multiple workload patterns
prerequisites: Completion of DEA-C01 Data Ingestion & Transformation Lab
Understanding of database concepts and data modeling
Basic knowledge of SQL and data warehouse design patterns
Familiarity with data storage concepts and performance tuning
businessScenario: DataVault Corporation manages petabytes of structured and unstructured data for analytics and machine learning workloads. They need to implement modern data storage architectures supporting data lakes, data warehouses, and hybrid scenarios. The data engineering team must design scalable, cost-effective storage solutions with proper governance, security, and performance optimization across AWS and Azure platforms.

topics: Amazon S3 data lake design patterns and organization
Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2 hierarchical namespace
Data lake zones: raw, curated, and consumption layers
File formats, compression, and storage optimization

hands-onExercises.expectedOutcome: High-performance data store supporting real-time analytics with low latency

troubleshooting.issue: Poor query performance and high costs in data warehouse operations
troubleshooting.solution: Optimize distribution and sort keys, implement proper compression, tune workload management, use appropriate node types, and implement query result caching

troubleshooting.issue: Data lake storage costs and performance issues with large datasets
troubleshooting.solution: Implement intelligent tiering, optimize file formats and partitioning, use appropriate compression, implement lifecycle policies, and optimize data access patterns

troubleshooting.issue: Complex data governance and compliance across multiple storage systems
troubleshooting.solution: Implement unified data catalog, use automated classification, implement consistent access controls, create audit trails, and use policy-driven governance
